CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.StageName, "Incubate"), "Incubate", IF(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.StageName, "Qualified"), "Qualified", IF(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.StageName, "Trial"), "Trial", IF(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.StageName, "Proposal"), "Proposal", IF(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.StageName, "Purchase"), "Purchase", IF(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.StageName, "Decision"), "Decision", IF(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.StageName, "Closing"), "Closing", IF(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.StageName, "Orders Processing"), "Orders Processing", IF(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.StageName, "Ready to Ship"), "Ready to Ship", IF(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.StageName, "Closed Won"), "Closed Won", IF(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.StageName, "Closed Lost"), "Closed Lost","" )))))))))))
CustomField.label: Opportunity Stage
